testcase.name: NL.BR-KVK-4.07
testcase.description: The jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate MUST be before the date of filing.

variation.name: Invalid End Date
variation.description: The instance has a 'jenv-bw2-i:FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate' value later than the filing date.
